Name: Forge Commander Vex
Description: Once the lead strategist for the digital defense force in the pixel realm, Forge Commander Vex now spends his days crafting legendary cyber weapons within the fiery depths of the WebtrES club's foundries. With arms and legs reinforced by the strongest virtual alloys and a screen displaying the menacing red and black hues of the battle interface, Vex is a figure of might and meticulous skill. His 'soldier' buttons are a reminder of his tactical prowess, while the hammer and wrench in his hands are tools of his new trade, forging cybernetic enhancements for his fellow club members. Despite his fearsome appearance, Vex is known for his unyielding loyalty and his strategic mind, which have saved the WebtrES club from numerous virtual threats.
